title: “I’ll never show mercy early on” - Strategy Trumps Mechanics ICYFAR G3 + 4
excerpt: Hey guys! we are back with a new person in charge of ICYFAR, yes this means that the email for submissions HAS CHANGED! In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players sent in their replays where they were trying to play with less than 100 APM!  CURRENT ICYFAR CHALLENGE:
